Sentencas: The aim of the paper is to investigate possible design modifications in tubular solid oxide fuel cell geometry to increase its performance.
Titulo: Entropy Generation Minimization in a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The analysis of the cell performances is conducted on the basis of the entropy generation.
Titulo: Entropy Generation Minimization in a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The use of this technique makes it possible to identify the phenomena provoking the main irreversibilities, understand their causes and propose changes in the system design and operation.
Titulo: Entropy Generation Minimization in a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The different contributions to the entropy generation are analyzed in order to develop new geometries that increase the fuel cell efficiency.
Titulo: Entropy Generation Minimization in a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: To achieve this purpose, a CFD model of the cell is used.
Titulo: Entropy Generation Minimization in a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The model includes energy equation, fluid dynamics in the channels and in porous media, current transfer, chemical reactions, and electrochemistry.
Titulo: Entropy Generation Minimization in a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The geometrical parameters of the fuel cell are modified to minimize the overall entropy generation.
Titulo: Entropy Generation Minimization in a Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
